name: Mailbox
description:
Imagine you have to send a congratulatory letter to grandmother who does not know how to use e-mail. Grab the envelope in the white area with the mouse, choose the direction and strength of the throw, and then throw the letter into the mailbox! Use the floor, buttons, teleports and moving platforms!
You will need fine calculation, fast reaction and patience to pass all 60 levels.

Feature of game:

- Arcade puzzle for people of any age.
- Simple mouse control.
- 60 levels of varying difficulty.
- Minimalistic design.
- Cartoon graphics.
- Energetic soundtrack.
- Easy attainments.
